knimeNode.name: Verify Test Blobs
knimeNode.shortDescription: Checks validity of data created by the corresponding creator node.

fullDescription.intro:
Checks validity of data created by the corresponding creator node. Select the two columns that come from the creator node and. Upon execution it will verify that the string hidden in the blob matches the verification string.
The node will fail if any row isn't valid.

ports.inPort: The table containing a blob column and their identifiers
